ygData.subject: RE: [eqenchanters] Iksar and Smiting Questions...
ygData.msgSnippet: I know with Illusion Iksar I am Dubious to Guards in Felwithe without any faction spells.  I would think this is the same.  Can Iksar be Agnostic? Mu ... From:
ygData.messageBody:
I know with Illusion Iksar I am Dubious to Guards in Felwithe without any
faction spells. I would think this is the same. Can Iksar be Agnostic?

Mu

-----Original Message-----
From: (Arakine) [mailto:vtemplarv@...]
Sent: Tuesday, November 07, 2000 1:25 PM
To: '(EQ Enchanters)'; '(EQ-Druids)'
Subject: [eqenchanters] Iksar and Smithing Questions...


I recently made an Iksar warrior and had a few questions for those of you
out there that have Iksar alternates/primary toons or are good friends with
someone that plays an Iksar.

Can an Iksar become non-kos to good or evil races on Antonica or Faydwer?

Since the newest upgrade to smithing, how much plat would it take to get a
175 or 200 in smithing? Estimate?

Since Blood Water is the only water in Cabilis, does this work in a forge,
or does it have to be a Flask of Water?

Can you Dye Cabilis Scale or only FS Plate?

I realize these are OT and mostly smithing questions, but I am hoping
someone out there has some experience with this. All feedback is
appreciated.


--
Arakine
